title: Drawing, "In The New England Woods", 1855–65
medium: Brush and oil, graphite on cream-colored ? paperboard.
description: Horizont view of the lower parts of the trunks of trees and a broken trunk in the fore- and middle grounds.  Rocky and mossy soil.  The grayish brown grounding color with color spots is shown in the bottom margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "In The New England Woods", 1855–65.
1855–65. Brush and oil, graphite on cream-colored ? paperboard.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-664-b.
